sections.title: Frontend
sections.paragraph: Frontend modules encompass the user-facing e-commerce components, including the web store, checkout processes, and replicated marketing sites designed for multi-level marketing (MLM) and direct sales organizations.

sections.title: Web Store & Checkout
sections.paragraph: The web store solution is a fully functional e-commerce experience providing flexible shopping arrangements and real-time checkout processing. Customers can search the online catalog, use the shopping cart, and manage delivery addresses.

panels.title: Web Store Configurations
listItems: Real-time e-commerce plug-ins and website blending

panels.title: Selling Features
listItems: Flexible Search Engine by keywords and items

sections.title: Order Checkout Options
sections.paragraph: inPowerSuite offers a comprehensive and efficient internet-based payment processing solution. The system supports customer registration, address standardization, real-time sales tax calculation, and various payment methods.

sections.title: Autoship Continuity Ordering
sections.paragraph: The platform supports configurable autoship products, blackout dates, and multi-frequency reordering schedules. It also includes autoship queues, batching, and automated notifications for credit card declinations.

sections.title: Replicated Websites
sections.paragraph: Enable your sales force with company-branded, multi-language website templates. Features include lead protection, a personal website wizard, and the ability to create multiple websites with bio, testimony, events, and personal links.

sections.title: Point of Sale (POS)
sections.paragraph: A mobile-ready solution built for tablet devices to perform floor and counter sales and exchanges. Supports customer lookup, applying discounts, and integration with cash drawers, card readers, and receipt printers.

sections.title: Member Enrollment
sections.paragraph: The module provides a comprehensive and customizable process for self-serve and up-line initiated new member sign-ups. Includes custom fields, sponsor lookup, multiple kits, and flexible payment options.

sections.title: Business Portal (User Back-Office)
sections.content: inPowerSuiteÂ® provides secured access to an extensive set of information portlets, business tools, reports and content by customer type. This centralized portal empowers the sales force to manage all aspects of their business operations efficiently.

sections.title: Dashboards and Features
sections.paragraph: Configurable, visually stunning, and easy-to-use dashboards offer multiple performance indicators (KPIs), sales goals, and recognition portlets for top sales and promotions.

sections.title: Sales, Genealogy and Commission Reports
sections.paragraph: Real-time KPI tracking provides immediate insights into sales performance. The system offers graphical and linear genealogy views, commission activity statements, and dozens of configurable charts for data analysis.
